Text: The Ariel Award for Best Supporting Actor (Spanish: Premio Ariel a Mejor Coactuación Masculina) is an award presented by the Academia Mexicana de Artes y Ciencias Cinematográficas (AMACC) in Mexico.
Triplets:<The Ariel Award
Academia Mexicana de Artes y Ciencias Cinematográficas
1:
--------------------
<Text: Ariel Award for Best Supporting Actor:  It is given in honor of an actor who has delivered an outstanding performance in a supporting role while working within the Mexican film industry.>
Triplets:<Ariel Award
